price: They will have therein all what they wish for, and We have yet more[16].
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ
footnotes: [16] Of unimaginable pleasures such as looking at the Face of Allah Almighty. See 10:26 and 75:22-23.
